enumerators.name: processType
enumerators.description: Process type - sets predefined temperature and holding time for the process

options.name: HTST25
options.description: High Temperature Short Time - highT = 353.15 K holdTime = 25.0 s

options.name: HTST15
options.description: High Temperature Short Time - highT = 356.15 K holdTime = 15.0 s

options.name: HHST3
options.description: Higher Heat Shorter Time - highT = 363.15 K holdTime = 3.0 s

options.name: HHST1
options.description: Higher Heat Shorter Time - highT = 363.15 K holdTime = 1.0 s

options.name: user
options.description: user specified - initial values highT = 363.15 K holdTime=1.0 s, user adjustable

enumerators.name: feedType
enumerators.description: Feed type - sets the composition of the fluid to be processed to certain predefined values

options.name: milkWhole
options.description: Milk, whole, 3.25% milkfat, with added vitamin D

options.name: vanillaFatFreeIceCream
options.description: Ice creams, BREYERS, 98% Fat Free Vanilla

options.name: user
options.description: user specified - initial composition set to pure water, user adjustable
